review_title: Generally positive but very hard work
job_title: Group Or Study Leader in Paris
pros: Good Pay and constant variety in the work. Good level of service for the clients. Interesting places we visit. Good educational content
cons: Poorly organised at times. NPS is the worst most nonsensical system I have ever seen as a means of testing how well a trip has gone. Far too much listening to the one or two unhappy clients (who were born unhappy and who like to spread their unhappiness from the Bahamas to Italy) rather than the majority happy ones
